sentences: Vanamees pidas tükk maad noortega sammu, siis väsis.
Ta on kiire astumisega, ei sina suuda temaga sammu pidada.
Katsu sammu pidada, me ei lähe ju kiiresti!
context: The word 'sammu' is used as part of the verb phrase 'sammu pidama' which means to keep pace or keep up with someone. It can be used literally when walking or marching at the same speed, and metaphorically when trying to maintain progress comparable to others in activities like studies, work, or development.
